## AvatarOptions.thirdPersonOnlyLayer property

[Layer number](https://threejs.org/docs/#api/en/core/Layers) to be displayed only for 3rd-person camera.

**Signature:**

```typescript
thirdPersonOnlyLayer?: number;
```
